info.name: Expense Tracker API
info.description: API collection for the Expense Tracker application

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Authenticate a user and get a JWT token
Verify user registration with verification code
Resend verification code to user's email

item.description: Authentication endpoints for signing in, signing up, and verifying accounts

request.description: Verify email and send password reset verification
Get transactions for a specific user
Get categories for a specific user
Enable or disable a category (admin only)
Get a savings goal by ID

item.name: Get All Savings Goals By User

request.description: Get all savings goals for a user

item.name: Get Active Savings Goals By User

request.description: Get active savings goals for a user

item.name: Get Completed Savings Goals By User

request.description: Get completed savings goals for a user
Add a contribution to a savings goal
Get contributions for a savings goal
Get all rewards for a user
Get available rewards for a user
Get redeemed rewards for a user
Add points to a user (admin only)
Get all saved transactions for a user

item.name: Get All Transactions By User And Month

request.description: Get all saved transactions for a user by month
Get a saved transaction by ID
